product_desc:
Roadgazer is intelligent assistant, that helps to plan and manage the car trips - it creates the itinerary with stops to see, eat and rest, educates on the surroundings, tracks the trip schedule, helps to resolve in-trip logistic issues - all on the go, interactive, by voice.

There are 1BN roadtrips done per year in US only. Bringing run-time A.I. Trip Assistant to car travelers means whole paradigm switch of how car trips are done: from long hours web-based tedious pre-planning and then struggling on the go with broken plans, to fast on-the go trip management right in the car. With, correspondingly, revenue flow toward in-car on-the-go solution from the “places” web apps.

With smartphones becoming central hub of connected cars, it makes a good fit for Roadgazer to become integrated solution for the Car Infotainment systems, so for the user ability to plan and manage the trip would be organically connected with the car itself.
high_concept: Artificial Intelligence Assistant for Car Trips
name: Roadgazer
